events.message: The candidate has submitted an application for the Software Engineer position through our online portal, providing a detailed resume and cover letter outlining their experience.
Recruitment team reviewed the application and categorized it under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate’s background in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate's progress and coordinate further interview steps.
The recruiter conducted a phone screening to assess the candidate’s technical skills and cultural fit, noting strong communication and relevant experience.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the position and availability for the next step of the interview process.
The technical interview was scheduled for the following week, with our senior engineer set to evaluate the candidate’s coding and problem-solving skills.
